lead_paragraph: The timing of the release of 1,500 pages of email correspondence on the day before Thanksgiving jars with Mayor Bill de Blasio’s repeated pledge to adhere to a policy of transparency.

headline.print_headline: Mayor Adopts Old Trick: ‘Dumping’ News When It Might Go Unnoticed
headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Adopts Old Trick: ‘Dumping’ News When It Might Go Unnoticed

snippet: The timing of the release of 1,500 pages of email correspondence on the day before Thanksgiving jars with Mayor Bill de Blasio’s repeated pledge to adhere to a policy of transparency....
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio has adopted so-called Friday news dump, old trick used by politicians hoping to avoid media scrutiny; tactic involves releasing large amount of potentially negative news late in week, before holiday weekend or at other times when it is likely to go unnoticed.
